title: I recommend to a friend or colleague
text: I got hacked many times but with this I feel more secure. You should make a app with all notifications of your account and security and you can cancel the change. This is great.

title: Not happy
text: I‚Äôm trying to get the Authenticator to work on my new iPhone. I‚Äôve read documentation that says I can import credentials from iCloud into my new device. The screens that the documentation tells me I should see in the authenticator don‚Äôt appear to exist. As a result, I cannot access my Coinbase account through my new phone. Very frustrating. I wish you guys would make this much easier. This is 2023.

title: Complete Trash
text: Microsoft should be ashamed of themselves. I have 3 authenticator apps. They all have the same name, ‚ÄúAuthenticator,‚Äù and basically the same icon. How am I supposed to tell them apart? Why not use the Microsoft logo somewhere in your app icon, geniuses? Also, I literally never get a notification sent to my authenticator app when Microsoft says they sent me a notification. The notification never goes through.

title: Really useless
text: Use 2FA - fine, really love to, but you diligently backup your phone every week with encrypted backup and it breaks, you get a new iPhone, you restore your complete backup on it, and the stupid MS Authenticator app has forgotten all of the 2nd factors set with it. Now you are cut from all your accounts. Really stupid. This app should store and restore from proper full phone backup. Many others do that just fine.

title: I lost all my codes and I‚Äôm locked out of a very important account
text: I always had iCloud backup on in case I ever needed to restore my phone. Well today I had to. I restored my phone and logged back into iCloud and redownloaded the app... and it kept reeling me it couldn‚Äôt find a backup. I am now locked out of a very important account with no access to it whatsoever. Really really upset right now. Don‚Äôt trust iCloud backup.

title: Everyone should have this app
text: Just amazing what Microsoft has done to push security levels to a different life changing system, thank you üôè

title: Nothing but issues with email since company started using this
text: Extremely inconsistent.   Sometimes asks for authentication 20 times a day.   Then has not asked for 5 months.   Changed the password on the pc and now I‚Äôm locked out of the phone because this isn‚Äôt working again.   Trash security that is worse than the consequences of being hacked.  Unbelievable am mouth of fake reviews on this atrocious piece of software.

title: LOST MY BACKUP
text: This app lost my backup!!!! It showed that it was being backed up to my iCloud. I made sure of this. When I switched to a different phone (after resetting my old phone), I went through the whole restore process within the app but it now states there are NO backups in my iCloud. NOW, I‚ÄôM UNABLE TO GET INTO ONE OF MY TWO-FACTOR AUTHENTICATION APPS. I‚Äôm completely locked out. This is ridiculous and it appears from the reviews, that I‚Äôm not the only one with this problem.

title: Issues with Authenticator
text: In the last two weeks the Authenticator does what it supposed to do- gives me a number and authenticates but then it takes forever and just spins , then it eventually comes up for a second and then just spins. Never loads teams. Using this for work. Please fix and send update!!

title: The most annoying thing ever
text: This app is ridiculous. I try signing in on the app and it asks me to authenticate it through the app, so it‚Äôs literally impossible to sign in. Then I try logging in on my Mac and it asks me to authenticate in the app but the app won‚Äôt let me in because it wants me to authenticate the app. It makes no sense, it‚Äôs an endless loop and now I can‚Äôt log in through any of my devices.

title: Glitching and Causing Problems
text: I have to have this app for school and it worked fine at first but now it is totally hindering me. It started saying that to get into my account I have to enter the number that pops into into my Authenticator app while I am already ON THE APP. Totally don‚Äôt get it nor do I know what to do. It‚Äôs having problems and I read other reviews who state that theirs is glitching as well.

title: Manageterial Magic
text: üåûI‚Äôve just been proven again by Microsoft at how great I‚Äôve always thought they were! I‚Äôve never second guessed them. Even my pillow is second to Microsoft. üß∏

title: Missing basic functionality
text:
We recently moved from OneLogin to MS Authenticator and I am frustrated by a lack of what I see as basic functionality.

As a user, I want the ability to approve a request from a push notification, either on my watch or phone, without opening the app, so that I can quickly get back to my work. 

This should easier and faster for me.

title: Does not work when transferring to new phone
text: MS Authenticator App does not work on my new phone.  Copied old iPhone 12 to new iPhone 14 and all Apps work except Microsoft Authenticator.  I did not discover this issue until after I traded in my old phone to Verizon.  Called Microsoft technical support and they said there was nothing they could do to get the App working on the new phone.  Terrible product and service. -Brian

title: Great app, but please add search option
text: Probably the best app for storing MFA codes. But it lacks search functionality when you have multiple accounts making it hard to use at times.

title: Microsoft authentication
text: Frustrating and hard to learn at first if you aren‚Äôt anxious or not feeling well, seriously I‚Äôll, sick, or tired, but, with some patience and time it has truly saved my life and gives me some peace of mind!

title: Subscription
text: Microsoft has been trying to get the best of the app for meis so much more than I need. I am 85 years old. I started the application beforeI realized this. I play games mostly and use Facebook to connect with my friends. Can you help me? Vera Miles

title: This app is a life saver!!
text: Being a young gamer makes it easy for me to forget my password or lose the paper I wrote it down on, it also made sure my accounts were safe and secure thank you!

title: Invalid Codes
text: I‚Äôm highly disappointed at this app right now. I logged out of my Instagram a few weeks ago & now I need to log back in. In order to log in, I need to enter the codes this app provides because of the extra security.. but it‚Äôs giving me the WRONG codes!!! Therefore I have no way of logging into my Instagram account. And there‚Äôs no phone number or email to where I can ask for help on this matter. Ridiculous!!!!

title: Best authenticator app
text: I have used Google Authenticator app before but Microsoft is easy to use and Microsoft is more secure than Google Authenticator app as it requires a password when opening the app

title: It would be better if has a Watch App
text: Would be nice to have a watch App, sometimes you had to go to another room to reach for your phone, when you got your Watch on your wrist.

title: It‚Äôs awful
text: I needed this app in order to access my email for school but I recently switched over to a new phone and now I can‚Äôt sign in because it doesn‚Äôt give me an option anywhere to put in the number. Now I can‚Äôt access any of my classes because of this and there‚Äôs nothing to do to fix it. Don‚Äôt get this app it‚Äôs a scam and a waste of time.

title: One small update needed
text: This could be so much better if it had Apple Watch support so I could enter codes on my watch instead of my phone. Other than that it seems to work as needed.

title: Major Bug draining battery and heating up phone
text: Whenever I open this app, my phone heats up very rapidly right where the processor is, going from room temperature to very hot within 20 seconds. This also drains my battery extremely fast, and I have no idea why it would do this. I‚Äôve updated the app several times and it has not been fixed. I‚Äôm using a 2020 iPhone SE if that matters.

title: Need authentication in order to use authentication app
text: This app is terrible. I‚Äôm trying to set it up and then it generates a 2 digit number and asks me to use itself to verify my identity in order to set it up. Which is impossible. I‚Äôve reset the phone restarted it uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Nothing worked and the forums and online recommendations are no help. Highly do not recommend.

title: Locks you out of your account
text: This app logged me out, so the only way I can log into the authenticator app is by getting approval from the authenticator app that I cannot log into. I am caught in a loop for some reason, because of this I no longer have access to my work email. This is an awful and disgusting app that will make work impossible. I would give it zero stars if I could.

title: Please help
text: I got into this app and when I was signing in I noticed a typo in my email. When I pressed ‚ÄúFix it here‚Äù it took me to a page to change it but when I pressed ‚Äúsubmit‚Äù or ‚Äúget a new email address‚Äù it didn‚Äôt work. The buttons weren‚Äôt working when I pressed them. I wanted to sign in but I can verify my account now. Please help.

title: Help Me
text: I downloaded the app, clicked on add accounts put my email and password in, and then it says for security reasons before you can access this account you must attempt these 3 ways to access your account, and 2 of the ways is using microsoft authenticator app...how am I going to use that if im trying to get into it? And the 3rd one is txt a phone mumber wich is not mine and I need to change and i need the authenticator app for that too...help

title: Simple and ease of use
text: I have used Microsoft products for a long time so it just made sense to use their authentication app. It‚Äôs simple with a clean interface to use.

title: Great App
text: I use the other Authenticator and this one works as well or better than those do. It does seem to notify me faster if Microsoft specific authentications as well.

title: Needs Improvement.
text: The point of any application is to make it as easy as possible for the user if they run into errors. I don‚Äôt understand why the application does not have a feature to recognize when it‚Äôs asking to authenticate on the application itself. I would like to see an option for guidance if that does happen.

title: Support Needed
text: I'm using a student account. I deleted the app because I didn't know you needed to use it EVERY SINGLE TIME you sign in. After I downloaded it again, it kept prompting me to open the Authenticator App and approve the request to sign in. Now I am locked out. I keep downloading the app and deleting it again, trying to sign in, and refreshing, but nothing works. I am very unhappy.

title: Apple Watch
text: Please bring back Apple Watch support. It was convenient  to approve authentication requests on the watch itself. There must be some reason why it was removed, but it will be beneficial to many to have this enhancement returned.

title: Least intuitive app I‚Äôve ever used
text: This is my first review on the App Store after getting so frustrated using this app. It just kept sending me in a loop back to the main setup screen at each step, where I would have to start over again. I watched the video that it says to watch and it keeps responding this way even after I carefully followed each step.

title: Can‚Äôt see the password
text: I can't see the password in iPhone APP. All the passwords become black dots; even if I click the eye icon next to the password, all black dots disappear instead of showing the password.

title: 0 customer service
text: Worst company I‚Äôve ever been forced to work with. My school requires this app to log in to your account and it just quit working for no reason. It‚Äôs now 2 hours passed when I tried to log in and I have still gotten no help whatsoever. No phone option for help, no chat, only forums to read but they don‚Äôt help because the garbage app just isn‚Äôt working

title: Does not sync
text: New phone, took about 20 installs of the app to get the sync to pull in my passwords. Now trying to sync to iPad and I am having the same issue with the ‚Äúgetting things ready‚Äù prompt, but nothing ever syncs. It also appears that new passwords from my MS Edge on PC and phone don‚Äôt always sync. What is wrong? Multiple accounts of this on the internet and no fixes. Please, if anyone could help.

title: No password protection
text: Surprisingly the most important app which is required to authenticate is open app. I failed to understand why this app doesn‚Äôt have password protection. What am I missing to understand here?

title: Works well and has a decent design
text: This works well and has a decent design. My only gripe is that I can‚Äôt search for the entry that I need. I have dozens of MFA configurations and sometimes it‚Äôs a pain to scroll through them all.

title: Dark mode and custom pictures please!
text: Dark mode and something other than the person doughboy for accounts please!!! Even just doing letter + color circles would help differentiate the different accounts.

title: Have not had any luck with this
text: Well shortly after I downloaded this app and added accounts to it my phone was reset and now can‚Äôt get n any of my important accounts and. The files of my back up codes of course was in the cloud which I thought would be safe ha and even backup to the cloud none of this worked and even tried to start all over and recover like it says on Microsoft support page ‚úåÔ∏èüí©

title: Not working on Apple Watch
text: Love the app but can‚Äôt get it to work on my new watch. I click get started and then it takes me to a screen that says I need to add a Microsoft account to my Authenticator and  there is no way to go any farther even though I already have a Microsoft account set up. I have watch 7 with most recent software.

title: Horrible App
text: All the steps for authentication should be inside one app. Why send users on a time trial across 3 apps to authenticate themselves every time they want to access their own emails?  Absolutely terrible and even more terrible are the companies that employ this because they simply do not care how people‚Äôs daily routine is effected as long as information is secure.  Go scratch.  All of you.

title: What a MESS
text: Switched to a new iPhone and what a pile of chaos it has been! No longer have access to my old phone and apparently missed the memo about changing settings in the app itself before transferring to new device. Now I‚Äôm locked out of accounts and I‚Äôm not being notified of codes, let alone getting codes at all. This has been an awful experience.

title: Dropped Apple Watch Support
text:
Apple Watch to authenticate is secure enough for almost everyone, given that it must be unlocked. Individuals and certain enterprise customers may wish to disable it, but it was a huge overreach to remove the functionality for everyone.

I keep my phone in a separate room during work hours, so if anything my watch is far more secure.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
text: My school is making me use this before I can log in. It makes me open the app, then I had to go to a browser, and then back to the app. I set up the account, everything looks good, but then when I go to login to my school account, it tells me to make an account, despite me already being logged in to an account through the app.

title: App works so well it can lock you out
text: I switched to a new iPhone and found out the hard way that this app needs a cloud backup setting turned on. Otherwise it will not recognize your new phone. I‚Äôm locked out of my Instagram account with no solution possible. Microsoft has a queue of 8000 for their help desk and Meta has no human available to reach out to.

title: Annoying
text: Doesn't work with 2 accounts. My school and work both require the app and I keep having to delete the app and create 1 new profile to get the Authenticator notification to pop up instead of being able to properly toggle accounts. You would think a big company like Microsoft could fix a simple issue like this.

title: Lost all accounts, locked out of everything
text: Sync, backup and restore don‚Äôt work. I got a new iPhone and it only brought back two accounts losing several others. I now don‚Äôt have access to my accounts, and can‚Äôt sign in to set up 2FA with my new device. I would recommend using one of the other apps for all your important accounts.

title: Can‚Äôt login
text: I‚Äôve downloaded the app before and had zero problems after resetting the password and now that I got a new phone I can‚Äôt login. Like how am I supposed to approve my login when I‚Äôm trying to login to the app?? There‚Äôs got to be a glitch or something because that doesn‚Äôt make sense. To approve my login I have to be login to the app which I‚Äôm trying to do but can‚Äôt.
